help.name: Help
help.discription_long: Shows you this menu. You can optionally provide another command after help to show you more about that command.

init.name: [Init]iative
init.discription_long: Rolls for initiative, optionally you can set what creatures have rolled before.

attack.name: Attack
attack.discription: Attacks a creature on your turn.
attack.discription_long: Attacks a creature on your turn, given the creature to attack, a dice roll or a number to compare against the creatures ac, and the amount of attack you did or will do with a dice roll.
attack.usage: ${prefix}attack <who gets attacked: creature> <to hit: Dice roll | number> <amount: Dice roll | number>

attackwith.name: Attackwith
attackwith.discription: Attacks a creature with a weapon
attackwith.discription_long: Attacks a creature with a weapon, provided the creature to attack and the weapon. If you are the DM you can also provide the creature to attack with.
attackwith.usage: ${prefix}attackwith <creature to attack | creature to attack with as DM <creature to attack>> <what weapon>
